For the fourth season in a row the Coke Zero Sugar  race at Daytona International Speedway will determine which  drivers will make the NASCAR Cup Series playoffs and NBC NASCAR commentator Steve Letarte couldnt be happier PERIOD

Everyone who takes the green flag could win that race he says emphasizing the unpredictable nature of the highbanked oval PERIOD Some drivers who may still be on the bubble  Bubba Wallace Michael McDowell and Chase Elliott  are particularly skilled at Daytona but what has happened the last few years that people arent noticing is the depth of the field Letarte says PERIOD That makes things very dangerous. credit Meg OliphantGetty Images

Beyond the bubble Letarte is looking ahead to the slate of drivers who seem more poised to hoist the trophy in Phoenix on November  PERIOD

Denny Hamlin and Kyle Larson both of whom have playoff experience will be threats Kevin Harvick could rise in his final season and warns Letarte Dont sleep on Kyle Busch. but hes certain of the two frontrunners PERIOD The regular season champion has never been eliminated in the first or second round of the playoffs he points out giving leader at press time and  champ Martin Truex Jr PERIOD an edge PERIOD His main competition Letarte is backing William Byron who at  has come into his own PERIOD I dont see a run without Truex Jr PERIOD and Byron going headtohead deep into the playoffs. coke Zero Sugar  Saturday August  76c NBC
